# init(asset:title:)

**Initializer**

Creates a download configuration for a media asset.

## Declaration

```swift
convenience init(asset: AVURLAsset, title: String)
```

## Parameters

- **asset**: The asset the task downloads.
- **title**: A human-readable title for this asset. The system displays this value in the usage pane of the Settings app; choose a title suitable for display in the userâ€™s preferred language.
title: init(asset:title:)
